<a href="../webapp" target="_blank">webapp</a>  

> This is an example webapp that uses [FastHTML](https://www.fastht.ml/) and demonstrates 
> how you can have a long running process that still returns a plotly object. 
> Long running processes were difficult in Dash.

<a href="../jlab" target="_blank">JupyterLab</a>  

> If this is your first time connecting to the server, you will be asked to enter your 
> token. To get the token, go back to your project directory and run:
> 
> ```bash
> katx jlab
> ```
> 
> This will give you an address that includes the token. After your first connection 
> your browser will cache the token and you will not be required to reenter it (unless 
> your browser cache is cleared).
